Description: Annual 100 m global land cover maps (2015–2019) with discrete classes and continuous percent cover for each land cover type
Near-real-time 10m land cover (Sentinel-2 based) with per-pixel probabilities for 9 classes
Daily 4-km gridded meteorological variables for the contiguous US
Monthly high-resolution (~4 km) global climate data including temperature
16-day composite global vegetation indices (NDVI & EVI) at 1-km resolution
Daily 500m snow cover extent (NDSI-based) and snow albedo from MODIS Terra (with quality masks)
Daily day/night land surface temperature and emissivity at 1 km from MODIS Terra (with quality flags and view angles)
8-day composite actual and potential evapotranspiration and latent heat flux (500 m) from MODIS Terra
MODIS Terra gross primary productivity (GPP) and net photosynthesis (Net PSN) 8-day composites at 500 m
Monthly global land surface model outputs (FEWS NET FLDAS Noah) – precipitation
3-hourly global land surface model outputs (e.g. evaporation
Daily global land surface variables (incl. soil moisture and evapotranspiration) from GLDAS-2.2 (Catchment model with GRACE DA)
Global 30 m DEM from reprocessed SRTM data (NASADEM)
SMAP Level-4 3-hourly land data assimilation with surface (0–5 cm) and root-zone (0–100 cm) soil moisture at 9 km

Dataset Name: NASA-USDA Enhanced SMAP Global Soil Moisture (10 km)
Description: Daily 10-km surface and subsurface soil moisture
Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM) DEM at 30 m (~1 arc-second) resolution
